TextView.android:text: Start of Shift:
Clock in and check with manager
Clean, sanitize and organize server station
Clean and santize all tables (downstairs, front and back patio)
Verify bathrooms were cleaned and stocked the night before
Refill caddies with salt/pepper shakers, ketchup, mustard, hot sauce and napkins. Wipe down caddies and bottles.
Put caddies on the tables
Clean/roll silverware
Clean the tea machine and make tea
Clean the coffee machine and make coffee
Stock server station (i.e. napkins, condiments, sugar, rolled silverware etc.)
Set front patio up by bringing tall tables outside and using red and white stools. Set up back patio by spreading out the chairs and tables. Wipe down tables and add caddies.
Clean off menus and check books if needed
Clean and sanitize trays
Put out chalkboards
Turn on tvs
During Shift (All shifts):
Keep server station clean
Make tea and coffee as needed
Mop floors and pick up spills when occur
Bus and wipe down tables. Keep restocking napkins as needed
Happy Hour:
Clean and roll silverware
Check bathrooms to clean or restock soap and toilet paper
Clean and sanitize tables used (in all areas)
Empty bus tubs if needed
Clean menus and guest books used
Clean and fill all condiments (ketchup, mustard, hot sauce)
Check out with manager, incoming server, and clock out
Clean/roll silverware
Clean and sanitize tables and chairs (in all areas)
Clean off server stations and restock; wope down shelves every night
Empty tea and coffee
Clean all trays, menus and guest books
Leave Kilroy's completely clean and ready for the lunch the next day
Tell management about anything out of stock or broken
Clean bathrooms and restock any necessary items
Wipe off all computer screens
Check out with closing manager and clock out
